messages.subject: Re: Sexuality Talks
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/14/2001 9:30:47 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... My son and I find driving in the car the perfect time to talk about sex.  I think it helps
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/14/2001 9:30:47 PM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> What would bother me is if my children felt they couldn't talk about
> sexuality in our home. My oldest is almost 10...I think we've got the door
> open. She has a few older friends which has brought some sexuality issues
> to the surface.
>
>
My son and I find driving in the car the perfect time to talk about sex. I
think it helps him to be in a position where we don't have to look at one
another. Most of the time I'm okay, but there have certainly been a few times
I felt that way too!

I really expected that most of the sexuality conversations would be with his
dad, but they never are--mostly me, sometimes Beth.

Kathryn



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
